snippet.title: Banner Saga 3 - Pre-order today!
snippet.description:
Pre-order Banner Saga 3 on PC/Mac today and get the “Dredge Ally Pack” to help you complete your final journey. This special pack includes the exclusive playable dredge character Kivi (Stoneguard Rank 10 Hero) with tank combat ability. It also includes his Sculptors Tools which grants the passive ability ‘Return the Favor’, exclusive Dredge Heraldry and heroic title ‘Shield Clever’. The pack also includes an exclusive Banner Saga 3 ‘overture’ track by Grammy-nominated composer Austin Wintory.

Banner Saga 3 will launch on July 26, 2018 on PC, MAC, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and SWITCH. Pre-order the game on PC/MAC today - https://store.steampowered.com/app/485460/The_Banner_Saga_3/
